author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content:
80% vaccinated plus those who have already had Covid should take them above herd immunity level.
Good news from Israel where latest statistics shown that after setbacks in the first eight days when people relaxed their guard, after 21 days individuals had over 90% immunity. First dose of Phizer vaccine. This is not from a small sample but from 1/2 million people.
Source of information, see Dr John Cambell’s 19th Feb daily report on YouTube, he lists all data.

author: Rick Spilman
content: Notwithstanding poor choices from leadership in the previous administration, the Navy appears to have done a highly professional job in managing the pandemic under very difficult circumstances.

author: Doug Bostrom
content:
Not to minimize the problem but it is actually a very remarkable achievement that with such an enormous crew working in confined quarters the Navy has managed to keep the case count so low.

It’s kind of astounding. And even if the number were an order of magnitude larger in reality, still an amazing accomplishment.

An indication perhaps of how things might go on the civilian side, if people were inclined to follow common sense.
